mapper.select: select * from GC_CARD_ACT where CARD_ID = #{card_id} order by created_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into GC_CARD_ACT(CARD_ID, ACT_ID, USER_ID, ACT_DESC, CREATED_DATE, ISLOG, ISEDIT) VALUES (#{card_id}, #{act_id}, #{user_id}, #{act_desc}, #{created_date}, #{islog}, '0')
mapper.update: update GC_CARD_ACT set CARD_ID = #{card_id}, USER_ID = #{user_id}, ACT_DESC = #{act_desc}, CREATED_DATE = sysdate, ISLOG = #{islog}, ISEDIT = 1 where ACT_ID = #{act_id}
